subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Tips and Tricks.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: •Pack a Day Bag:Bring a small day bag for daily excursions.
•University Influence: Highlight the vibrant student life and the influence of theuniversity on the city's culture.

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Tips and Tricks.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: •Additional Tips:Plan your wine tour route in advance and consider hiring a driver orjoining a guided tour to avoid drinking and driving.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: •Electronics:Smartphone, charger, power bank, and other devices. Bring a traveladapter if needed.
